list.name: Changes
list.comment:
With this commit you can run it with terminal command using the following command in the same directory as the sed_calculation.py "sed_calculation.py -i objects_file.dat"
It will automatically run on the whole .dat objects list giving you the output in the output_test both with .fits and .csv formats.

task.summary: initial commit Working code both for sed_cutting and sed_calculation of the best QSO_chi2 and BD_chi2. Working plot file to plot the source as an output png in output_test directory. Also the code that converts magnitudes to fluxes.

initial commit Working code both for sed_cutting and sed_calculation of the best QSO_chi2 and BD_chi2. Working plot file to plot the source as an output png in output_test directory. Also the code that converts magnitudes to fluxes.

With this commit you can run it with terminal command using the following command in the same directory as the sed_calculation.py "sed_calculation.py -i objects_file.dat"
It will automatically run on the whole .dat objects list giving you the output in the output_test both with .fits and .csv formats.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
With this commit you can run it with terminal command using the following command in the same directory as the python sed_calculation.py "sed_calculation.py -i objects_file.dat"
It will automatically run on the whole .dat objects list giving you the output in the output_test both with .fits and .csv formats.
